name: fullstackopen2020-execrise-part3
description: This is the repository for the part3 of fullstackopen2020

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen2020-execrise/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen2020-execrise-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
